title: Where is Heimeringer best?
body: Where should the mighty Donger go?

replies.body:
A dumpster cause he is boring as fuck.

But honestly he is basically a counter laner, if your going to do it in ranked just pick top and mid, because he honestly doesn't have a better one (just good and bad matchups in each)
You really think he is boring? I though he was quite fun

He gets extremely samey in that all you have is chuck down turrets and hope the enemy team are stupid enough to fight you, otherwise, farm.

You don't have any real ability to actually start a fight.
I think the donger is just best against melee champs in general, very safe in your turrets if they have to get in melee range to hurt you or get cs

I have a personal belief in the Mid Donger! 
Standard builds at present have a Magic resistance core in them (Aegis into Banner)
once you've completed your first item you're unkillable in lane, but then you're also able to branch out and control minions elsewhere with your Banner of Command!

Mid {{champion:74}}  for the win!

I think he is best mid because of the common picks in midlane such as {{champion:238}}  {{champion:105}}  {{champion:157}} {{champion:7}}

Heimerdinger though will struggle a bit against champions with long range poke.
top or mid and build a zz for keks
